name: Dr Who
overview: Promotional game based on the cult British sci-fi TV series Doctor Who. Game design by Jennifer Diane Reitz and Stephen P. Lepisto. Coding by Stephen P. Lepisto. Graphics by Jennifer Diane Reitz. According to info. in the game, DOCTOR WHO is "promoware" and served as an appetizer or promotion of sorts in lieu of Accursed Toys' first commercial game BOPPIN' (i.e. it was designed to showcase the coding skills of Accursed Toys as an up-and-coming games developer). The game is a collect and avoid game set in a maze-like complex.
